com.googlecode.streamflyer.experimental.stateful.util

Class IdleModifierState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.streamflyer.experimental.stateful.util.IdleModifierState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    State

    public class IdleModifierState
extends Object
implements State
    This state does not modify the character stream and does not switch to another state.
    Since:
    14.09.2011
    Author:
    rwoo

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StatefulAfterModification modify(StringBuilder characterBuffer, int firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer, boolean endOfStreamHit)
      Does the same as Modifier.modify(StringBuilder, int, boolean) but, additionally, the returned result contains the new state for the StatefulModifier.
